original_text: These people choose to forget things that they really know. A long time ago, God spoke his word and he made the sky and the earth. He caused land to come up through water. He made the land to be separate from the water.
korean_text: 이는 하늘이 옛적부터 있는 것과 땅이 물에서 나와 물로 성립된 것도 하나님의 말씀으로 된 것을 그들이 일부러 잊으려 함이로다

sentences.original_text: These people choose to forget things
A long time ago, God spoke his word
and he made the sky and the earth
He caused land to come up through water
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 물을 통해 땅이 솟아오르게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He made the land to be separate from the water
